CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: OFF for quick splitting cells or ON for slow moving worms.
CONTROLS.NAME: regime_toggle

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Concentric circles feed or poison the simulation.
CONTROLS.NAME: cycling_rings

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Extra pulsing and shimmering with the music. Turn off to let it naturally progress.
CONTROLS.NAME: audio_reactivity

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Choose from one of 7 color palettes.
CONTROLS.NAME: color_regime

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Mix to greyscale for a more minimal look.
CONTROLS.NAME: greyscale

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Lower for a lot of smaller cells. Higher for fewer, big cells.
CONTROLS.NAME: scale

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Affects how fast it naturally travels.
CONTROLS.NAME: flow_resistance

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Affects how eagerly it occupies empty space.
CONTROLS.NAME: space_filling

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Lower bound for the birth parameter.
CONTROLS.NAME: birth_lower

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Higher bound for the birth parameter (more important).
CONTROLS.NAME: birth_upper

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Lower bound for the survival parameter.
CONTROLS.NAME: survival_lower

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Higher bound for the survival parameter. (Turn this up if you're getting frequent black outs).
CONTROLS.NAME: survival_upper

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Timestep. Turn this up for faster, glitchier action.
CONTROLS.NAME: timestep

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: This applies a flow direction to the simulation. This interacts in complex ways with the other parameters. Try to search for different stable flow regimes.
CONTROLS.NAME: xy_flow

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: If the simulation dies, return to default parameters and press this button.
CONTROLS.NAME: reset_sim

DESCRIPTION: A variant of Stephan Rafler's SmoothLife that uses a separable Gaussian kernel to compute inner and outer fullness. The improvement in performance over full 2D convolution makes it possible to use a much larger kernel in realtime, without using FFT.
TITLE: Gaussian SmoothLife_dup
